item.title: Admin Help, How do i make them
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Codez Epic Codez
item.description:
@Epic_Codez wrote:

There is a possibility that you have a giveadmin or givemod command in your source. Otherwise if that fails go into the servers character or char folder and open THEREUSERNAME.txt and change the character-rights = X.

Put the X as one of the Following:

0 = Normal players
1 = Moderator
2 = Administrator
3 = Owner
4 = Hidden Admin/Co (Only on some cases)

Read full topic
item.source: Admin Help, How do i make them
